argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Landlord failed to register property with Rent Stabilization Program as required by CSFRA
argumentsAndDecisions.reimbursement: Rent reduction for October 7-9, 2022 plus reduction of banked increases through August 31, 2023
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, landlord was notified multiple times including September 30, 2022
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Property registration records confirmed non-compliance until October 10, 2022
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Constituted substantial noncompliance with CSFRA affecting rent increase validity

petitions.respondent: Gina Frye, Lydia Sanabria (Calson Property Management)
